scripts.docker:log: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yaml up nest next
scripts.prisma:build: pnpm --filter ./nest exec  prisma generate --schema=libs/prisma/schema.prisma  && pnpm --filter ./nest exec  prisma migrate dev --schema=libs/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.docker:base: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yaml up -d --build postgres redis
